CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 4 reads: "3. The main attraction was the food demonstration..."
TitMainTitle: Two women, one speaking into microphone, the other working on oven, conducting cooking demonstration in Natural Gas Companies appliance display, in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
